author: davidlange6
body:
1) Don't make a new cut parser object for every jet and lepton (do it once instead)
2) deltaR2(candidate,candidate) is much faster than deltaR2(candidate.p4(),candidate.p4())
3) remove memory leaks from HypDilepMaker
4) reserve memory and move if statements out of loop in de/dx producer
title: Technical performance improvements for 74x
